title.rendered: BBLUNT Style Bar celebrates Children’s Day with Smile Foundation champs

content.rendered:
This Children’s Day, BBLUNT Style Bar – an extension of India’s premier hairdressing salon – BBLUNT,celebrated Happier Hair Days with their ‘Styling for Kids’ initiative. Adhuna Bhabani, Celebrity Hairstylist and Founder of the brand along with the team of experts from their Thane branch gave young champs of Smile Foundation fun hair makeover, spreading happiness.

Speaking on the occasion, AdhunaBhabani, Founder and Creative Director, BBLUNT said, “Children today are extremely bright and it’s always a pleasure to interact with them. When this opportunity of collaboration with Smile Foundation came by, the Style Bar team at Korum Mall, Thane and I were really excited. It’s a great feeling to spread joy through our work and what better occasion than Children’s Day? I personally think small happy moments like these make a huge difference in the lives of these talented kids and everybody should try to do their bit.”
